name: generate
description: Generates and/or modifies files based on a schematic.

options.name: schematic
options.description: The schematic or collection:schematic to generate.

options.name: main
options.description: The name of the main entry-point file.

options.name: clientProject
options.description: Name of related client app.

options.name: route
options.description: Route path used to produce the app shell.

options.name: name
options.description: Name of the universal app

options.name: appId
options.description: The appId to use withServerTransition.

options.name: outDir
options.description: The output directory for build results.

options.name: root
options.description: The root directory of the app.

options.name: index
options.description: Name of the index file

options.name: universalProject
